thread.title: Academy head triumphs over teaching union in landmark case
thread.title_full: Academy head triumphs over teaching union in landmark case

title: Academy head triumphs over teaching union in landmark case
text: Academy head triumphs over teaching union web troll after a 'year of hell': She wins public apology in landmark case for the victims of online abuse Head teacher Pepe Hart, 47, resigned her post after spate of online abuse Mrs Hart launched a libel case after an NUT member claimed on Facebook she was banned from working with children Kate Mimnagh, 27, worked under Mrs Hart at an academy in Somerset and made the claim In a landmark victory for head teachers Mrs Hart won a public apology
